mapper.insert: insert into AREA_NOTICE (userid, boardid, board_regdate, dongCode) values (#{userid}, #{boardid}, #{board_regdate}, #{dongCode})
mapper.update: update area_notice set readed = 1 where boardid= #{boardid}
mapper.select: select userid, dongcode as dongCode, boardid, board_regdate, readed from area_notice where userid = #{userid} order by board_regdate desc
